snippet.title: RetroRealms: Ash vs Evil Dead & Halloween Double Feature - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The first two games in the RetroRealms horror series--John Carpenter’s Halloween and Ash vs Evil Dead--are available now on PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and Steam. Watch the RetroRealms launch trailer to see bloody gameplay from the 16-bit-style platformer game based on the 1978 film Halloween and the Starz television series Ash vs Evil Dead. Take on the role of Michael Myers in Halloween to slash through familiar settings and overcome the ultimate evil that has descended upon our world. In Ash vs Evil Dead, play as Ash Williams in your fight against Deadites.

#Gaming #EvilDead #Halloween
